content.title: Front-end Developer
content.description: Hi, I have been working with web development for about 11 years, I'm graduated in Information Systems and also in Technical Programming. I participate in open source projects on Github and I'm a great Javascript enthusiast, At the moment I'm working at YoungCapital, one of the greatest job suppliers in the Netherlands. Would you like to know more about me? Check it out my {link1} and {link2}.
